overview:
About Me

I love everything about digital communication, marketing and branding, with a particular focus on web strategy. I’m Experience Planner at Queen Global Communications. I’m hosting a TEDx in May 2010, I organize regular Business Networking Meetings for QGC.

I m a Social Media Strategist. I’m a social media fanatic and business networking advocate.

I use jackylopez.com as a personal blog, a gathering point to share questions, opinions and insights about an on-line world. I write basically to exchange thoughts and feelings - I call it “Wondering Out Loud” - and to learn as much as possible from anyone who wants to contribute.

I’m passionate about helping business owners, independent professionals, and entrepreneurs to strategically grow their businesses using creative online marketing techniques.

I use Social Media to propel female leadership and inspire others to use new media to create positive change for themselves and their community.

Secret Weapon: I help companies outsmart their competition.

Visit my website http://ccwnetwork.com and follow my comments http://twitter.com/Jacky_Lopez, check latest articles I wrote http://jackylopez.com and also become a fan of my Facebook profile http://facebook.com/jackylopezconsultant

More about me

Founder - President at Jacky Lopez Consulting.

TEDxChumash Host

Founder Central Coast Women’s Network

Central Coast Women’s Network is the result of that idea. Launched in March of 2008, CCWN, a membership based organization, dedicated to female entrepreneurs and professionals.

I speak Spanish, English, Portuguese and Guarani
